title: Turning point in world history, fossil fuels

content.prompt: Which of the following best supports the argument that the last three decades of the nineteenth century were a turning point in world history?

choices.label: Significant increases in demand for fossil fuels for industrial uses
Transition from use of coal and steam to nuclear power
Significant increases in agricultural productivity due to Green Revolution technology

skill.text: Skill 3.D: Explain how claims or evidence support, modify, or refute a source's argument.
